title: Honest John: how can I stop spider webs forming on my car?
text:
If your car has developed a fault, or for consumer advice, turn to Honest John by emailing honestadvice@telegraph.co.uk

Webbed feat

How can I stop spider webs repeatedly forming in my door mirror? GM

Leave them alone. Just think what the spiders are doing: killing and eating flies that might otherwise get into your car.

Burning question

Together with other volunteers, I recently spent a fruitless 30 minutes on Budleigh Salterton beach, trying to find another holidaymaker's lost car keys. Thirty odd years ago, before computer chip keys, I suffered the same fate, but getting a new key then needed nothing more than a visit to any car spares shop. Since then, I now follow a simple procedure and tie...
description: If your car has developed a fault, or for consumer advice, turn to Honest John by emailing honestadvice@telegraph.
